items.name: Exigea
items.summary:
- Developed a Slack Bot tool for easy access to logging/triggers inside the crawler.
- Implemented a Jira integration for creating tasks in case of critical warnings.

**Technologies:** Python, Docker, Django, Celery, RabbitMQ, Scrapy, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, React

items.name: Rudymental IT
items.summary:
- Developed a desktop traffic monitoring application which facilitates traffic survey generation by automating video analysis.
- Embedded and customized various state-of-the-art deep learning models to provide multi-class multi-object detection and tracking, as well as vehicle licence plate recognition.
- Designed and implemented a pipeline that extracts, manipulates and renders traffic video data into multiple traffic survey related functionalities, such as statistics, queries, rendered videos and equation computation.

**Technologies:**  Python, Tkinter, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Anaconda.

items.name: Thoughtworks
items.summary:
- Designed and implemented new features for the website, store and command center which improve user experience and ultimately provide a complete networking solution.
- Developed and integrated customized themes using WordPress and PHP.
- Facilitated marketing enablement and support with the use of Salesforce Pardot, ZenDesk and WordPress AIOSEO plugin.

**Technologies:** PHP, Docker, Symphony, Vuejs, Javascript, WordPress, HTML/CSS, MySQL, Redis

items.name: DeepDream
items.summary:
Convolutional neural network based deep learning model which identifies and enhances patterns using algorithmic pareidolia.
- Developed an understanding of the key factors in generative networks by delving into manipulating pretrained layers.
- Employed gradient ascent to produce feature visualization and improved results using Gaussian filters to validate the model's learnings.

items.name: IMMPlaH: Integrated Medical Monitoring Platform for Home-care assistance
items.summary:
Distributed system for an intelligent medication management system for home-care. Composed of several modules, the system is an improvement of remote healthcare:
- Facilitates medical history and medication plan upkeeping through a patient management web application that caregivers can make use of.
- Automatic pill-boxes aid patients by using a notification system to remind them of their medication; Lowers the risk of missing or taking extra medicine.
- Patient safety is ensured by constant sensor monitoring, meant to detect if an accident took place; Sensor responses are registered in a queue and interpreted by the server, such that the caregiver is notified through the web application if any anomaly has occurred.

items.thesis:
Deep learning computer vision research project. Developed and tested three new transformer-based object detection architectures based on Facebook's DETR model.
- Reduced training time by 45%, from 24h to 10.8h, by using 1/4th the parameters of the base model, while maintaining competitive scores.
- Reduced convergence time by 50%, from 150 to 75 epochs, by using patch image embedding instead of feature maps of the initial image.
- Proposed a transformer-only architecture, as opposed to the hybrid base model.

**Technologies:** Python, Docker, PyTorch, Anaconda, Google Colab, Jupyter Notebook
